Users can now endorse skills. they can only endorse once per skill. They can currently endorse their own skills. Competence has been renamed user_skill. This name was chosen after speaking with some individuals experienced in sql. It conveys the message well of being the user's skill
column5: and also follows sql naming convention because it links user with skill. It has one downside
column6: that being user_competence_path is now user_user_skill_path which is not very pretty. For that reason alone I will be looking at other possible names. Closes #56'
